messages.message:
Hi Team, With 24.04 deployed in JPMC, they have noticed few changes in the behaviour in the refiner app(from Solution builder or otherwise).
1. While opening the refiner with all records, it used to give a pop-up at the bottom until all records are loaded completely. That pop-up is missing now in 24,04. Is this by design? This cause the user to run the field before all records are loaded as sometimes the user does not know how many records are there.
2. While running a single field, the pop-up appears showing that the field is running, but it disappears after 2-3 seconds and comes back and it goes on until field run is completed. 
Attaching a video from JPMC env showing the first scenario and 2nd scenario can be seen towards the end of the video.
ticket: https://instabase.zendesk.com/agent/tickets/8261
cc: @Sujith
@dg, which version are they coming from? 24.01?
Which version were they on previously that didn't have these identified issues? I'm trying to narrow down the timing of when soemthing might have changed.
What I have observed is, even when we upload any files to the filesystem, the uploading message would dissapear after 5-10 seconds and in the background the uploading happens
We upgraded recently(last week) from 23.07 to 24.04

Okay, so it could be that the root of the issue is in the toasts, not necessarily in Refiner. @Xindi Xu, I see in March you replaced all of our toasts with the one coming from pollen. Any chance something happened during that migration that would have caused this?

1 → i don't remember changing anything
2 → Not sure. Likely this has to do with the pollen toast implementation, or maybe the toast container gets unmounted for unknown reasons
@Liam Callanan, anything you can think of from when you were moving toast to pollen?

If toasts aren’t appearing at all this is likely because of the toast container issue like xindi mentioned.
If there’s a toast that disappears & re-appears then it probably needs its priority set to “high”
